ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] DOTs, extremely impressive
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, I suppose I could ve switched in McVaxius Horn with Discord, but switching instruments in a dungeon setting mid combat just gives me the creeps. ...
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 11 Apr 2000 kim@... wrote:

> Unless you were swapping instruments for Discord, my gut feel
> would be that the most improvement would've come from adding
> Chain. Chain not only snares a mob, it slows down its
> attacks, meaning you take less damage and get bashed less.

Well, I suppose I could've switched in McVaxius' Horn with
Discord, but switching instruments in a dungeon setting mid combat just
gives me the creeps.

> I usually also keep Screech memorized. If you're losing a
> fight against a mob but can manage to get it under half, then
> you can just chain/fear it the rest of the way even if you
> were losing badly up til then.

You're right, screech would've given me the option to fear/chain
and on hindsight that would've been a better song choice. At the time I
was worried about Shaman and their healing capabilities, so I had Pixie
Strike. That really wasn't necessary though. Also, Tagar's and other
slowdown spells have no affect on you when you go all instruments, which
is a huge plus :).
BTW, your original numbers on damage/second aren't totally
accurate, because you didn't figure in hand to hand damage. My hand to
hand skill went up at least 10 points last night.

--
Miriana
Legions of Darkness
Innoruuk Server
